frost_imps.description: Small, mischievous creatures made of ice, quick and slippery on the snowy terrain
abilities: Can throw snowballs that slow the player

jungle_creepers.description: Vine-covered beasts that blend into the lush foliage, ambushing unwary travelers
abilities: Can entangle the player with vines
Reduced mobility and damage over time

swamp_sludges.description: Gelatinous blobs that absorb organic waste to grow larger and more dangerous
abilities: Split into smaller blobs when attacked

moonlight_wolves.description: Pack hunters that roam under the night sky, their eyes glowing with a haunting light
abilities: Bites have chance to cause bleeding

blood_bats.description: Flying creatures that feast on the blood of the living, often found swarming in dark places

infernal_minions.description: Lesser demons spawned from the fires of the underworld, eager to spread chaos
abilities: Explode upon death dealing area damage

stone_sentinels.description: Animated statues guarding ancient ruins, stoic until provoked

fae_sprites.description: Mischievous and ethereal beings with a penchant for tricks and illusions
abilities: Cast confusing spells that invert controls

astral_specters.description: Ghostly entities that drift through the cosmos, remnants of forgotten astral conflicts

goblin_tinkers.description: Crafty goblins with a knack for machinery and explosives

rogue_mercenaries.description: Battle-hardened fighters for hire, found throughout the dungeon seeking treasure
abilities: Expert in melee and ranged combat

cursed_armor.description: Animated suits of armor, haunted by spirits of fallen heroes

shadow_stalkers.description: Ethereal creatures that thrive in shadows, attacking with stealth and precision

arcane_wisps.description: Errant magical energies condensed into floating orbs
abilities: Randomly cast spells from various elemental schools

plague_rats.description: Diseased rats that swarm through darker, damper parts of the dungeon

fire_sprites.description: Playful but dangerous spirits of fire that dart around, igniting surroundings

crystal_scavengers.description: Beasts with crystalline bodies that hunt for magical minerals

thunderbirds.description: Majestic birds that control the weather, often found perched high
abilities: Cause gusts of wind that knock players back

banshee_wailers.description: Ghostly figures whose cries echo through the dungeon

mystic_oracles.description: Mysterious figures using arcane tools to manipulate fates

ice_revenants.description: Frozen undead warriors, wielding swords of pure ice
abilities: Shatter into ice shards when damaged

stone_golem.description: A smaller but formidable golem made of rubble and ancient armor
abilities: Charges at player causing area damage
Pull rocks from walls as shields

spectral_knight.description: A ghostly armored knight wielding a large spectral blade

crimson_witch.description: A dark sorceress who specializes in blood magic and curses

hydra_spawn.description: A smaller version of a mythical hydra with multiple regenerating heads
abilities: Each head has different breath attack
Cutting one head causes two more to grow

iron_construct.description: A heavily armored automaton powered by steam and ancient technology

mud_behemoth.description: A massive creature made of swamp mud and plant matter
abilities: Launch globs of mud that slow

shadow_assassin.description: A stealthy and deadly assassin that blends into shadows

frost_banshee.description: A chilling wraith that wails to freeze foes in place

arcane_sentinel.description: An ancient guardian constructed from enchanted stone and arcane crystals

toxic_maw.description: A giant beast with acidic saliva and poisonous spikes

inferno_drake.description: A young dragon with smoldering scales capable of igniting surroundings

thunder_wraith.description: A ghostly figure crackling with raw electrical energy

boulder_beast.description: Composed of rocks and earth, can reshape form to crush foes

necrotic_alchemist.description: A mad scientist obsessed with death and decay
abilities: Throws explosive vials releasing necrotic gas

crystal_colossus.description: A towering figure made from radiant crystals

rogue_elementalist.description: A former mage turned rogue, wielding chaotic elemental magic
abilities: Cycles through fire, ice, and lightning spells

sand_serpent.description: A massive serpent that burrows through sand and strikes with terrifying speed
abilities: Lunges from beneath for surprise attacks

magma_goliath.description: Born from heart of volcano, skin is molten rock and fire

wind_screecher.description: A bird-like creature with mastery over winds

jungle_titan.description: An enormous moving tree with vines and wildlife supporting it

frost_wyrm.description: A gigantic dragon made of ice and snow, capable of freezing attacks and summoning blizzards

swamp_leviathan.description: A massive serpent-like creature lurking beneath murky waters

lycan_alpha.description: The leader of the werewolf pack, larger and more cunning

vampire_lord.description: An ancient and noble vampire with power to control shadows and blood

demon_warlord.description: A towering demon armored in molten lava

giant_stone_guardian.description: A colossal guardian made from the rocks of the dungeon itself

fae_queen.description: A deceptive and powerful fairy that uses magic to confuse and attack

celestial_sentinel.description: A guardian of the cosmic threshold cloaked in starlight
